ygData.subject: Re: Weapon questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I generally carry a few around.  My primary weapon is the Dark Reaver.  I haven t gotten around to trying a Flesh Ripper, but it sounds like it might be fun.
ygData.messageBody:
I generally carry a few around. My primary weapon is the Dark Reaver. I
haven't gotten around to trying a Flesh Ripper, but it sounds like it might
be fun. If I'm walking around for effect, I use the Reaper of the Dead. It
tends to intimidate people more. Otherwise I still like playing with my
blood claw, and the thulian claws just make me look like a mean biatch!

But like I stated earlier, the DR is my most effective tool at the moment.

X.
----Original Message Follows----
From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
I was just curious what weapon/s other high level SK's like to use. I've
found that the DR is my weapon of choice, but I do switch to the FleshRipper
when I'm not to concerned about the AE getting me killed (A DD spell would
have made this weapon so much nicer). Also lately I've found myself using a
Cryt. Sword and MM shield combo (just looks cool, with all the black and
silver plate). Any of you find any other weapons you like using (Thulian
claw, etc??)..

Enjoy...

-=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
